backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Contains structured evidence reports mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists autogenerated summaries describing frontend files, their purpose, and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Sets Tailwind base layers and theme variables for light and dark modes using OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entrypoint containing the root div and script loader for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling page routing, puzzle state, and rendering all site sections in order.
frontend/src/components/FinalMessageSect: Displays the closing Valentine message with heart icon, signature, and styled love note block.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHeartsOv: Continuously spawns floating emoji hearts with randomized position and timing for a decorative overlay.
frontend/src/components/HeroVideoSection: Shows the hero video with play/pause controls, overlay text, and stylized frame.
frontend/src/components/MusicToggle.tsx: Provides a floating button to play or pause background music with graceful error handling.
frontend/src/components/OpeningSection.t: Intro section with animated heart, greeting text, and multiple paragraphs expressing affection.
frontend/src/components/OurBestMemoriesS: Displays a featured romantic photo with floating heart decorations inside a styled SectionShell.
frontend/src/components/OurMemoriesBackg: Shows a full‑screen background image with dark overlay and a romantic text line.
Renders an interactive Valentine proposal with a moving 'No' button and a celebratory 'Yes' response.
frontend/src/components/SectionShell.tsx: A wrapper section component adding scroll‑reveal animation and layout styling.
frontend/src/components/SoftHeartsOverla: Generates floating heart emojis with random positions and animation for a subtle background effect.
frontend/src/components/SorrySection.tsx: Displays an apology message with emotional text and themed icons inside a styled SectionShell.
frontend/src/components/UnlockMomentsPuz: Implements a small 2x2 image puzzle that triggers a celebration and callback when solved.
frontend/src/components/VideosSection.ts: Shows two navigational cards for photos and videos, optionally locked with an overlay.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useEvasiveNoButton.ts: Provides logic for randomly repositioning a 'No' button and cycling teasing text.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, login/logout flow, and provides identity context to the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useRevealOnScroll.ts: Provides a hook using IntersectionObserver to detect when an element becomes visible and expose a ref and visibility state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables, custom romantic utilities, and animations for the app's visual style.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Renders a themed photo gallery page with a back button, curated images, and romantic styling elements.
frontend/src/pages/PhotosPage.tsx: Displays an 8‑photo gallery with romantic styling and navigation back to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/VideosPage.tsx: Shows a grid of video cards with play/pause controls and themed layout, plus navigation back to home.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with OKLCH color tokens, custom fonts, shadows, and plugins for animations and typography.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, features, and architecture for a romantic themed React + Tailwind web app.
